ygData.subject: Sequel Suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: I think if we make a sequel it should involve Legacy.  You all know my first suggestion, here s my second: Legacy dumps the poison, but it has a wierd affect

I think if we make a sequel it should involve Legacy.  You all know my 
first suggestion, here's my second:

Legacy dumps the poison, but it has a wierd affect on the nitrogen in 
our atmosphere.  Most of it becomes Latent, but some of it interacts 
with our bots sending them into stasis until a decade in the future 
(our future 2012 A.D.) so the story of the continent of Atlantis being 
destroyed in a day and a night was really the story of a couple of 
bots being put into stasis lock for a few million years and Plato just 
left off a couple of zeros because he didn't believe the Earth could 
be that old when we think a zero got added in making it 10,000 instead 
of 1000 years.  But then they wake up in the near future and start 
slaggin' again.
